text: Yeh chilla chilla ker unn say kahen gey kay kiya hum tumharay sath na thay woh kahengay kay haan thay to sahi lekin tum ney apney app ko fitnay mein phansa rakha tha our intizar mein hi rahey our shak-o-shuba kertay raheyour tumhen tumhari fazool tamannao ney dhokay mein hi rakha yahan tak kay Allah ka hukum aa phoncha our tumhen Allah kay baray mein dhoka denay walay ney dhokay mein hi rakha
